DataElement.preferredName: Systemic Autoimmune Disease Current Personal Medical History Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Affecting the entire body, a condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.  Which is occurring in the present time or is in a record of a patient's background regarding health._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Systemic Autoimmune Disease Current Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Affecting the entire body, a condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.  Which is occurring in the present time or is in a record of a patient's background regarding health.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (sis-TEM-ik) Affecting the entire body.:A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.

Concepts.definition: A disorder resulting from loss of function or tissue destruction of an organ or multiple organs, arising from humoral or cellular immune responses of the individual to his own tissue constituents. It may be systemic (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus), or organ specific, (e.g., thyroiditis).

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Current or history of systemi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or history of systemic autoimmune disease requiring systemic therapy, including significant autoimmunity associated with prior ipilimumab therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or history of systemic autoimmune disease requiring systemic therapy.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an active autoimmune disease or history of autoimmune disease that might recur, which may affect vital organ function or require immune suppressive treatment including systemic corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or history of systemic autoimmune disease requiring systemic therapy, including significant autoimmunity associated with prior ipilimumab therapy or therapy with antibodies to PD-1 or PD-L1

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have an active autoimmune disease that has required systemic treatment in the past 2 years (i.e. with the use of disease-modifying agents, corticosteroids or immunosuppressive drugs)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Active autoimmune disease requiring systemic treatment?
